Content: “In the Tall Grass” is a 2019 Canadian horror drama film written and directed by Vincenzo Natali and starring Patrick Wilson. It is based on Stephen King and Joe Hill’s 2012 novella of the same name. In the Tall Grass takes place when “after hearing a young boy’s cry for help, a brother and sister venture into a vast field of grass in Kansas but soon discover that there may be no way out.” The is scheduled to be released tomorrow, by Netflix.
